ul.li: For "background-size", possible values are [length | percentage | auto] {1,2}

body.p: If statement above is true, this paragraph should have a auto (default) background size for its nist jpg image. Image is in lower right corner. The rule applied is "p {background-size: ;}". body.p: All other properties of this page should be UA-default. This is a paragraph, like the one above. However, it may not be large enough for a background image.
